mapper.select: select t.ID,t.STRTERMNUM,t.STRBANKNUM,b1.STRBANKNAME,t.STRBRANCHNUM,b2.STRBRANCHNAME,t.STRSUBBRANCHNUM,b3.STRSUBBRANCHNAME,t.STRSSBNUM,b4.STRSSBNAME,t.DEVICEID,t.STRNETADDR,t.STRTELLERNUM,s.SVCSTATUS,s.IHDWSTATUS,s.IAGENTSTATUS,s.CASHACCEPTORINFO ,s.CASHDISPENSERINFO,d.IDEVTYPE,d.STRDEVMANU as strDevMenu,t.FORVERIFICATION,t.APTLID,dict.label as strDevType from z_term t,z_termstatus s,z_bank b1,z_branch b2,z_subbranch b3, z_selfsvcbank b4,z_device d,z_sys_dict dict where t.STRTERMNUM = s.STRTERMNUM and t. STRBANKNUM= b1.STRBANKNUM and t. STRBRANCHNUM= b2.STRBRANCHNUM and t. STRSUBBRANCHNUM= b3.STRSUBBRANCHNUM and t. STRSSBNUM= b4.STRSSBNUM and t.DEVICEID =d.ID and d.IDEVTYPE =dict.value and dict.key = 'device_type'
